body.name: PurSteam 10-in-1 Steam Mop, Floor Steamer with Detachable Handheld Steam Cleaner for Tile, Hardwood Floors

byLineInfo.name: Visit the PurSteam World's Best Steamers Store

deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 16 hrs 9 mins
features: Chemical Free Cleaning – PurSteam 10-in-1 Steam Mop uses the natural power of heated steam to clean your home. Unlike many steamers for cleaning, this steam mop is perfect for homes with children and pets.
For the best clean we recommend using distilled water. DO NOT under any circumstances use VINEGAR to clean your steam mop.

Heats in 30 Seconds – Quickly steam mop hardwood floors and tile. Use the mop as a carpet cleaner, grout cleaner, or floor cleaner, even as a steam mop for laminate floors. Includes a measuring cup to refill it with distilled water.

Handheld Steamer – Detach the steamer for clothes or use it as an upholstery cleaner for fabric, sofas, and drapes. It’s lightweight and makes quick work of stubborn wrinkles. Simply suspend your clothes on a hanger and steam them.

Light & Maneuverable – The mop head swivels to reach around and under furniture. Our washable mop cloths are designed for carpet cleaning (with the carpet glider) too. Also, the handle on our multipurpose mop collapses for easy storage.

Accessories – Our electric mop comes with small/big brushes, an angled nozzle (kitchen stove tops, tight spaces), brush for grout lines (sanded/non-sanded), a scrape tool, steamer jet, squeegee, carpet glider, and microfiber cloths.
body.description: Clean the Natural Way Now you can clean your home without the use of harsh chemicals when you steam with water. It’s great for people with allergies and people with pets or small children. Due to the hot steam, please use care when operating it and when you replace or remove an accessory. Includes 2x replacement pads Removable handheld steamer Folding handle for compact storage Detachable Handheld Steamer Voltage/Frequency: 120 V/60 Hz Capacity: 12.8 fl oz (380 ml)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Brushes for Kitchen/Bath The Therma Pro 211 Steam Mop by PurSteam comes with multiple accessories for household cleaning purposes. The Small Brush and Big Brush work well on ovens, bathtubs, toys, tile, and for cleaning refrigerators. Designed for Grout Use the Double Brush tool to clean grout lines (sanded or unsanded). The narrow width brush allows you to run along the grout surface with hot steam while you brush away the grime. Hard to Reach Places We all have annoying crevices where grime and grease collect in the kitchen, bath, and throughout the home. Use the Steamer Jet as an adapter for the Angled Nozzle (shown here) to direct the steam into tight spaces.

Steam Off Grime Got grime? Don’t we all! Scrape off baked on food residue with the Scrape Tool. It works well on surfaces like cooktops/hobs, ovens, and heat-resistant bakeware, lids and lasagna pans. For Glass & Mirrors Squeegees aren’t just for cars. Now you can say with confidence: I do windows. Our Squeegee attachment works on glass windows and tables, shower doors, and mirrors. Fabric & Steam Ironing Yes, this is also a garment steamer. Use the included Garment Cloth with the Squeegee accessory to steam curtains, tablecloths, drapes, sofas, and chairs. You can even steam iron your clothes or fabrics on a heat-resistant surface.

Fast Heating Our steamer heats up fast! Turn it on and 30 seconds later you can start steaming. Large Surface in One Tank Mop large areas of your home with our upright steam mop. You can steam hardwood floors like shown here. It is also a carpet steamer (use the carpet glider). You can also detach the handheld wand steamer. Large Tank and Operation Time This modular steamer has a large tank capacity that’s easy to refill with water while steaming. Use the switch and steam regulator button which is conveniently located above the tank cover. You can release powerful steam for around 25 minutes at the maximum setting.

Microfibre Pads In addition to the 2x included reusable mop pads, we offer replacement pads for purchase separately. Our microfibre pads are machine washable! The ultra-fine microfibre cloth is soft and gentle on surfaces. Clean the Natural Way Now you can clean your home without the use of harsh chemicals when you steam with water. It’s great for people with allergies and people with pets or small children. Due to the hot steam, please use care when operating it and when you replace or remove an accessory. Includes 2x replacement pads Removable handheld steamer Folding handle for compact storage Detachable Handheld Steamer Voltage/Frequency: 120 V/60 Hz Capacity: 12.8 fl oz (380 ml)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is one of my favorite purchases! I absolutely love it. It’s super easy to use and does a great job. It heats up fast and produces lots of steam. It works so well on my tile and laminate floors. It removes spills and spots super well. It’s lightweight and glides across my floors very smoothly and effortlessly. The pads are easy to put on and take off. I’ve been handwashing them after use and they seem to come clean easily. The cord is long enough for me to do my kitchen and dining room without having to change outlets. I have dogs and cats so it is really nice to be able to give my floors a deep cleaning! I highly recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome steam cleaner!
reviews.reviewText: There’s before and after photos on the grout on my kitchen tile. Black was before. White is after. This was years of dirt in the grout that came out with very little effort with this steam cleaner. The assortment of attachments is also amazing. They thought of pretty much everything for the attachment. It creates steam almost instantly. I can mop my whole kitchen floor on one tank basically. Even if I have to refill it, it heats up so fast it doesn’t matter. Easy to use and it folds up which is nice. All these other steam cleaner were way more expensive. I saw this guy for that price and decided to try it. I’m only mad I didn’t buy this years ago. The only thing that would be even better is having something or somewhere on the mop to store the attachments. Or even a case or box for them. But I have plenty of boxes so it’s no big deal. You don’t need to use any chemicals either to get anything clean. I’m going to be cleaning so many things now that have been a pain to clean because you have to scrub hard for so long just using a brush and chemicals. Like I said this thing is basically effortlessly to get things clean. Amazing product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Old House (1970's) Vs. Steam Mop!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased my home almost a year ago from the sweetest older gentleman I've ever had the pleasure of meeting. He was not in the greatest of health, and unfortunately the home cleaning part he fell behind on, as he simply didn't have the energy to keep up with it.Despite my best attempts, (and many tik tok mopping hacks) that gross black layer that has formed over the (incredibly retro) floor in the kitchen barely budged, and much to my dismay became even more obvious when we relocated the refrigerator across the kitchen and left that clearly clean spot that the portable dishwasher just isn't large enough to fully cover. (See picture 1.) So my hunt for something that could hopefully get the stuff to come clean, so I can quit lamenting over just how much I hate this flooring and want to replace it.I've used steam mops in the past, and I can vouch for how good they have worked before, but I personally haven't had access to one since I lived with my mother. I also have 4 cats, so I wanted something powerful, but also chemical free, and personally loathe playing the floor is lava for the hour following a standard bucket and floor mop session.I purchased the PUR Steam mop because it had the long handle for floor mopping usage and ALL OF THE ATTACHMENTS!!!!! I like attachments, it makes me feel like I'm saving money because I can use the machine in a multitude of ways, and I went all in. I got it, opened the box, and put it to WERK. It comes with a handy little funnel and a measuring cup that is conveniently just the right size to fill the device. Neat!I started by mopping my kitchen floor. the velcro on the floor usage apparatus is powerful, but it's velcro. So I'm sure after many uses, it will start to weaken. I'll cross that bridge when I get to it. My bonus kids watched in awe as I effortlessly mopped my kitchen 3 times in 15 minutes. It's a tiny kitchen. And they went trekking through in socks as I was doing so, and I'm happy to report there were no complaints of wet socks! I wish I would snapped a pic of the aftermath of the kitchen mop, because it was BAD. I giggled like a maniac and took my mopping adventures to the bathroom. Where our litterboxes are. Our 2 recent cat additions like to track their poo on the tile in the bathroom because they MUST get immense enjoyment out of stepping in it, knowing I'm going to have to clean that up, because EW. My white tile is white again, and the dried on poo stood NO chance. Needless to say the microfiber pad was much worse.I then turned my focus to my stove, to which I've used probably every degreaser under the sun to limited success. I actually kinda cheated a little, (Sometimes you need a little extra help the first time. Hoping for chemical free cleaning after this) and liberally applied my favorite degreaser, let it sit for about 10 minutes, then went to town on the stove with the detached steamer unit, and the large and small scrub brush. It's plenty light, even when full, and the cord is pretty long, so my arms didn't get tired as I was furiously scrubbing the stove. There was so much steam that I couldn't tell where I had already gotten, and my glasses were super fogged up, but I felt like I had gotten everywhere at least a few times. Wipe it up with a paper towel, and my stove hasn't looked better! The only pitfalls so far to this machine is that I kinda ruined the brushes, which with 212 degree (on the instruction booklet) steam, and enough downward force, I expected it. I'll be shopping around for some replacements, but I figure I still have a few more good uses out of them, and when your not using the floor mop handle it is LOUD. I went looking for earplugs after a little while of stove cleaning. I then tackled the glass for the stove in the same manner. Heavy degreaser, wait 10 minutes, then go to scrub town. I was so chuffed with the results, I couldn't be done yet.I swapped the pads and tried the carpet glider attachment. The carpet in my home is old, and so packed down in some places, I've been considering just purchasing new carpet, as I've seen the hack to re-fluff your carpet is with a damp towel, a hot iron, and a carpet brush. Well ain't nobody got time for that. Once again getting the bonus kids socks seal of approval, this machine didn't leave any wetness in the carpet that stuck, so I ran the carpet mop over the floor several times, turned my shark robot vac to high, and let it rip. You can tell where the carpet is trying to fluff back up thanks to the agitator brush on the robot, so I figure a few more times of that and hopefully it'll be fluffy again.The machine pads are machine washable, so I threw them into my washer alone, with a detergent pod, and a scoop of washing booster powder, and they came out looking dang near brand new. I was SHOOKETH. I'm going to buy more later so I can have a microfiber pad for each room. I can't wait to try out the window squeegee attachment, and the grout cleaner attachment in my shower.I definitely recommend this product. Was worth every penny in my eyes. I hope it lasts a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quick, All in one, versatile steam mop
reviews.reviewText: review for the Pur Steam wet steamer, over all I'd say this was a great buy for the price, I have textured vinyl floor that is an off white which at times can be bear to keep clean and worked pretty well. I also use this on my hard wood floors and its alot easier to use then mop buckets and dries quicker. Positives relatively light weightfolds easily can remove middle portion to fill at sinkheats water quicklyeasy assembly priceFor under 60 dollars this really does the job and works as it should. It also has a number of other functions I have yet to try out (steamer, hand held mop, carpet cleaner) This also heats and is ready to use within 5 mins of setting up and plugging in. cons (minor)only comes with two padscorded

I loved this little steam cleaner I bought October 2022. However I went to turn it on and the green light goes on but the cleaner will not heat the water. So disappointed, would have expected it to work for more than 6 months when it only gets used once a week. Sent a note to manufacturer last week but have had no reply. If this is the kind of quality I won't be buying this or any product from this manufacturer in future. Waste of money
Compre una garantia y no se como ingresar a ella mi articulo recien comprado ha tenido una falla

The only thing I don't like about this machine is it runs out of water so quickly and you have to lay it flat to refill. They did not supply a cup like my last one did, to make filling easier. At first my floors were so streaky, I called customer service and was told I was using too hot a setting. She was right and I couldn't be happier.
No sirve, es mejor un trapeador convencional
Had it for about 6 months and this feeble plastic latch already broke. It needs better engineering. Also, pads don’t stick well since it uses velcro. Buy at your own risk!
